Great program, you can piss off your team mates with just a press of a button from the shortcut. And beware of too much noise that might lead to voting.

The program itself was light weight but I think the UI could still be improved a lot. Also, I am only using the demo. Just restart if you hit the limit!
I love playing nae nae ni**a nae nae using this. It kinda gets annoying having to close it to play more than 10 songs but Idgaf since this is the demo
Honestly pretty good. No hassle and its easy to use. Haven't had any issues with it.

Everytime I've used the Soundpad Demo my discord audio messes up and I can't hear my friends and they can't hear me unless I re-enable my mic and headset in my audio settings. I want to keep using this soundpad demo but everytime I have it installed it messes my discord up. If a developer or someone who can help reach out to me to help fix this problem that would be great.

So here's my full honest opinion about Soundpad Demo Edition. It should be free. The full product, that is. I get the same amount of usage from the Demo and anyone who buys the real thing should be evaporated.

I like the full version, and this is VERY similar to that, But the time limit is kinda poopy.

But it works well enough for me.

Its gud.
it very good, you press the button and funny sound happen at the time... very good in game and fun with friends funny times yes :)
Its perfect for trolling in Rainbow Six Siege and CS:GO with loud earrape meme songs

good soundboard, no bugs, no problem with setup, but Demo is annoying.

negative.review:
Had a very unpleasant experience with this software that caused it to corrupt my sound permanently.  Despite removing all traces of it as directed, it was still impacting my audio and causing problems with Dolby Audio.  Whatever is missing, the computer before and after Soundpad were in two different states.  None of the assistance I could find had a resolution and I was forced to restore my operating system to factory settings.  This finally purged the impact of Soundpad from my computer.

I am not recommending this program because while the software itself will be gone when removed the effect it has had on your PC can be eternal.  This is what happens when you mess with core Windows files like audio drivers.  Purging the tampered files and reinstalling all new ones did not fix the problem making me wonder what else was being tampered with.
It destroyed my mics, now there increddibly low volume and the settings wont fix it. THANKS.
after uninstalling this software i still can't hear anyone in game or in apps like discord.
Microphone does not work after install. Re-installing driver resolves the problem.
after using it for awile it doesnt go threw discord anymore. help?
You can get soundpad for free.. come on
this app great it pretty funny to use
